oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Postcard, "Camiflouge a Machine Gun."
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: A color-tinted photo postcard of two soldiers laying on the ground next to a leaf pile that camouflages a machine gun, with more leaves camouflaging their hats. Their ammunition is in front of them. The reverse is stamped with an advertisement from Smiths Variety Store, Wayside, W. Va. Collected by Ethel Flesher Stewart of Parkersburg, W. Va.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: World War, 1914-1918; World War, 1914-1918 - History
